name: IDEA (group_17)
description:
Idea is  a First Person interactive experience. You can move and explore the space you created yourself, interact with a funny ice cream maker and a jumping squirrel who will try to make you reproduce the sounds made by him. 

Everything is set in a suggestive low poly 3D environment that will bring you  in an idyllic place through the use of a headeset and controllers

How to play

The game is based on the interaction with different elements of the scene,  so when you finish interacting with one of them  you can decide to continue or move to the next one.  First of all you have the opportunity to create the space around you, then you will see an ice cream maker coming and you have to help him for a certain period of time. After that you will met the third character, the jumping squirrel who likes to play with his acorn. So which of the interactions will inspire your creativity? 

Let's try and have fun!

CREDITS
